name: Artificial Intruder
description:
Artifical Intruder is a First Person Puzzle game. You had lost your employee KeyCard and only have a few minutes before you have to clock out for the day or risk getting fired. Search the office and clock out on time! 

This game was made in 7 days for the Inde Game Dev Beginner Jam  #003. by a single developer. 

NOTE: this project will be updated after the Jam to include more game play and clean up the alpha build mess. If you would like to see this project continue, I would love to get feedback on ways to make it better! 

Enjoy!
